top_projects.name: p2pt
top_projects.description: Simple WebRTC Peer 2 Peer connections using WebTorrent trackers as the signalling server. Use WebTorrent trackers for any kind of WebRTC app ! 🔥 Make WebRTC apps fast & easy ! 🚀⭐

top_projects.name: WebDrop
top_projects.description: Easiest group P2P File & Message transfer in browser with WebRTC 🔥. Cross-platform alternative to Apple's AirDrop, Xender, ShareIT with the same speed over LAN. No installation, just a website :)

top_projects.name: manglish
top_projects.description: A malayalam to manglish converter Android app

top_projects.name: dots
top_projects.description: P2P Dots & Boxes game with WebRTC & WebTorrent

top_projects.name: phpwebcrawler
top_projects.description: A Web Crawler Created in PHP

KochiFOSS/kochifoss.github.io.summary: The repository experienced significant activity recently. Recent commits included adding Call for Papers (CFP) and RSVP pages with automatic redirection to the latest forms. Key commits involved enhancing layouts, adding meta refresh redirects, and creating fallback content for unexpected redirect failures.

profile_summary: As a seasoned full stack developer with over 10 years of experience, I leverage my expertise in C, JavaScript, and PHP to design and implement robust web applications. With 730 followers and 181 public repositories, I maintain an active development presence and contribute to the tech community through my work at BigBinary. Currently, I'm exploring various innovative ideas, as reflected in my public GitLab profile and 'ideas.md' repository.
